title: Massive inconvenience or great opportunity?
body:
Yes, the whole situation is a bit shit. However..
Isn't this a great chance to team up with your clash members and put in some solid practice and discussion of strategies for 2 weeks?
Perhaps it gives you time to replace that one member that slipped in at the last minute to fill the spot (despite being a bit of a dick).

I was quite frustrated and annoyed at the inconvenience of things last night while it all unfolded, but this morning I woke up with the realisation that this is a chance to get prepared. Now we know what to expect before the match at least..
